text: Ra Anumzana tamagri Anumzamofona ra agi amiho. Ru ana osu'nesageno kna hina haniza avreno tamagritera egahie. Ana hanigeta agonaramintegama vanoma hanazana hanimpina tanafa huta masegahaze. Tamagra tavi masama kesaza zankura tusiza huno tamavesigahie. Hianagi Anumzamo'a tavi masa eri amne hina tusi hanizampi manigahaze.
